N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 27.4 - Requirements for patient care and treatment

State Regulations
(a) Nondiscrimination. Staff of facilities shall provide services in such a manner
as to assure that they do not discriminate against a patient in terms of his or
her race, color, sex, creed, religion, age or national origin. (b) Physical environment. Staff of facilities shall provide services in such a manner
as to assure that the physical environment is safe, sanitary and conducive to
effective treatment. (c) Socialization. Consistent with a patient's service plan, directors of
facilities shall assure patients a reasonable opportunity to associate with any
staff member, or patient or members of the general community in order to foster
the development of the patient's social competences and preferences. The staff
of facilities shall not permit socialization with individual patients to
interfere with staff duties. Notes
